snippet: Cardinal Reinhard Marx, 60, the archbishop of Munich, was selected on Wednesday to lead the Roman Catholic bishops’ conference in Germany.
abstract: Cardinal Reinhard Marx, archbishop of Munich, is selected to head the Roman Catholic bishops' conference in Germany.
lead_paragraph: Cardinal Reinhard Marx, 60, the archbishop of Munich, was selected on Wednesday to lead the Roman Catholic bishops’ conference in Germany.

headline.main: Germany: Bishops Select Pope’s Confidant as New Leader
headline.print_headline: Germany: German Bishops Select Pope’s Confidant as New Leader
